source:
%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_base_Horizon
AS
SELECT
    CAST(NULL AS Long) AS NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    ,CAST(Horizon.HorizonCaseNumber AS Int) AS caseid
    ,Horizon.casereference
    ,Horizon.projectname
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS projectNameWelsh
    ,Horizon.projectDescription AS projectDescription
    ,Horizon.summary
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS projectDescriptionWelsh
    ,Horizon.caseCreatedDate
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS decision
    ,CASE WHEN LOWER(projectstatus) = 'not published' THEN 'unpublished' ELSE LOWER(projectstatus) END AS publishStatus
    ,sector
    ,projecttype AS projectType
    ,MAX('Horizon') AS sourceSystem
    ,stage
    ,projectLocation
    ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS projectLocationWelsh
    ,projectEmailAddress
    ,LOWER(Region) AS Region
    ,CAST(transboundary AS Boolean) AS transboundary
    ,CAST(easting AS Integer) AS easting
    ,CAST(northing AS Integer) AS northing
    ,CAST(welshLanguage AS Boolean) AS welshLanguage
    ,LOWER(mapZoomLevel) AS mapZoomLevel
    ,sos AS secretaryOfState
    ,datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject
    ,dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite
    ,anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific
    ,anticipatedDateOfSubmission
    ,screeningOpinionSought
    ,screeningOpinionIssued
    ,scopingOpinionSought
    ,scopingOpinionIssued
    ,section46Notification
    ,dateOfDCOSubmission
    ,deadlineForAcceptanceDecision
    ,dateOfDCOAcceptance
    ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS dateOfNonAcceptance
    ,dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen
    ,dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose
    ,extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
    ,dateRRepAppearOnWebsite
    ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS dateIAPIDue
    ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS rule6LetterPublishDate
    ,preliminaryMeetingStartDate
    ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM
    ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS notificationDateForEventsDeveloper
    ,dateSection58NoticeReceived
    ,confirmedStartOfExamination
    ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS rule8LetterPublishDate
    ,deadlineForCloseOfExamination
    ,dateTimeExaminationEnds
    ,stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate
    ,deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation
    ,dateOfRecommendations
    ,stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline
    ,deadlineForDecision
    ,confirmedDateOfDecision
    ,stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline
    ,jRPeriodEndDate
    ,dateProjectWithdrawn
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS operationsLeadId
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS operationsManagerId
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS caseManagerId
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS nsipOfficerIds
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS nsipAdministrationOfficerIds
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS leadInspectorId
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS inspectorIds
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS environmentalServicesOfficerId
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS legalOfficerId
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS applicantId
    ,CAST(FALSE AS Boolean) AS migrationStatus
    ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart
    ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose
    --Start Horizon only fields
    ,examTimetablePublishStatus
    ,twitteraccountname
    ,exasize
    ,tene
    ,promotername
    ,applicantfirstname
    ,applicantlastname
    ,addressLine1
    ,addressLine2
    ,addressTown
    ,addressCounty
    ,Postcode
    ,applicantemailaddress
    ,applicantwebaddress
    ,applicantphonenumber
    ,applicantdescriptionofproject
    ,caseNodeId
    --End Horizon only fields
    ,MIN(FALSE) AS migrated
    ,MIN('Horizon') AS ODTSourceSystem
    ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
    ,MIN(ingested_datetime) AS IngestionDate
    ,NULL AS ValidTo
    ,'' AS RowID
    ,MIN('N') AS IsActive
FROM
    odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_data AS Horizon
GROUP BY
    Horizon.HorizonCaseNumber
    ,Horizon.casereference
    ,Horizon.projectname
    ,Horizon.projectDescription
    ,Horizon.summary
    ,Horizon.caseCreatedDate
    ,CASE WHEN LOWER(projectstatus) = 'not published' THEN 'unpublished' ELSE LOWER(projectstatus) END
    ,sector
    ,projecttype
    ,stage
    ,projectLocation
    ,projectEmailAddress
    ,LOWER(Region)
    ,CAST(transboundary AS Boolean)
    ,CAST(easting AS Integer)
    ,CAST(northing AS Integer) 
    ,CAST(welshLanguage AS Boolean)
    ,LOWER(mapZoomLevel) 
    ,sos 
    ,datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject
    ,dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite
    ,anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific
    ,anticipatedDateOfSubmission
    ,screeningOpinionSought
    ,screeningOpinionIssued
    ,scopingOpinionSought
    ,scopingOpinionIssued
    ,section46Notification
    ,dateOfDCOSubmission
    ,deadlineForAcceptanceDecision
    ,dateOfDCOAcceptance
    ,dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen
    ,dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose
    ,extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
    ,dateRRepAppearOnWebsite
    ,preliminaryMeetingStartDate
    ,dateSection58NoticeReceived
    ,confirmedStartOfExamination
    ,deadlineForCloseOfExamination
    ,dateTimeExaminationEnds
    ,stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate
    ,deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation
    ,dateOfRecommendations
    ,stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline
    ,deadlineForDecision
    ,confirmedDateOfDecision
    ,stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline
    ,jRPeriodEndDate
    ,dateProjectWithdrawn
    --Start Horizon only fields
    ,examTimetablePublishStatus
    ,twitteraccountname
    ,exasize
    ,tene
    ,promotername
    ,applicantfirstname
    ,applicantlastname
    ,addressLine1
    ,addressLine2
    ,addressTown
    ,addressCounty
    ,Postcode
    ,applicantemailaddress
    ,applicantwebaddress
    ,applicantphonenumber
    ,applicantdescriptionofproject
    ,caseNodeId

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_Order
AS
SELECT
    row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY caseid ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
    ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate ASC, caseid ASC) + (SELECT MAX(NSIPProjectInfoInternalID) FROM odw_harmonised_db.nsip_project) AS NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    ,caseid
    ,IngestionDate
FROM
    vw_base_Horizon

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_validTo
AS
SELECT
    Base.caseId
    ,Base.IngestionDate
    ,Next.IngestionDate AS ValidTo
FROM
    vw_Horizon_Order AS Base
    LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_Horizon_Order AS Next
        ON Base.caseID = Next.caseID
        AND Base.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = Next.ReverseOrderProcessed

%%sql
SELECT
    Input.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    ,Input.caseid
    ,Input.casereference
    ,Input.projectname
    ,Input.projectNameWelsh
    ,Input.projectDescription
    ,Input.summary
    ,Input.projectDescriptionWelsh
    ,Input.caseCreatedDate
    ,Input.decision
    ,Input.publishStatus
    ,Input.sector
    ,Input.projectType
    ,Input.sourceSystem
    ,Input.stage
    ,Input.projectLocation
    ,Input.projectLocationWelsh
    ,Input.projectEmailAddress
    ,Input.Region
    ,Input.transboundary
    ,Input.easting
    ,Input.northing
    ,Input.welshLanguage
    ,Input.mapZoomLevel
    ,Input.secretaryOfState
    ,Input.datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject
    ,Input.dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite
    ,Input.anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific
    ,Input.anticipatedDateOfSubmission
    ,Input.screeningOpinionSought
    ,Input.screeningOpinionIssued
    ,Input.scopingOpinionSought
    ,Input.scopingOpinionIssued
    ,Input.section46Notification
    ,Input.dateOfDCOSubmission
    ,Input.deadlineForAcceptanceDecision
    ,Input.dateOfDCOAcceptance
    ,Input.dateOfNonAcceptance
    ,Input.dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen
    ,Input.dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose
    ,Input.extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
    ,Input.dateRRepAppearOnWebsite
    ,Input.dateIAPIDue
    ,Input.rule6LetterPublishDate
    ,Input.preliminaryMeetingStartDate
    ,Input.notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM
    ,Input.notificationDateForEventsDeveloper
    ,Input.dateSection58NoticeReceived
    ,Input.confirmedStartOfExamination
    ,Input.rule8LetterPublishDate
    ,Input.deadlineForCloseOfExamination
    ,Input.dateTimeExaminationEnds
    ,Input.stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate
    ,Input.deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation
    ,Input.dateOfRecommendations
    ,Input.stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline
    ,Input.deadlineForDecision
    ,Input.confirmedDateOfDecision
    ,Input.stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline
    ,Input.jRPeriodEndDate
    ,Input.dateProjectWithdrawn
    ,Input.operationsLeadId
    ,Input.operationsManagerId
    ,Input.caseManagerId
    ,Input.nsipOfficerIds
    ,Input.nsipAdministrationOfficerIds
    ,Input.leadInspectorId
    ,Input.inspectorIds
    ,Input.environmentalServicesOfficerId
    ,Input.legalOfficerId
    ,Input.applicantId
    ,Input.migrationStatus
    ,Input.dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart
    ,Input.dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose
    --Start Horizon only fields
    ,Input.examTimetablePublishStatus
    ,Input.twitteraccountname
    ,Input.exasize
    ,Input.tene
    ,Input.promotername
    ,Input.applicantfirstname
    ,Input.applicantlastname
    ,Input.addressLine1
    ,Input.addressLine2
    ,Input.addressTown
    ,Input.addressCounty
    ,Input.Postcode
    ,Input.applicantemailaddress
    ,Input.applicantwebaddress
    ,Input.applicantphonenumber
    ,Input.applicantdescriptionofproject
    ,Input.caseNodeId
    --End Horizon only fields
    ,Input.migrated
    ,Input.ODTSourceSystem
    ,Input.SourceSystemID
    ,Input.IngestionDate
    ,Calc.ValidTo
    ,MD5(
            COALESCE(
                    IFNULL(CAST(Input.caseId AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.caseReference AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.projectName AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.projectNameWelsh AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.projectDescription AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.summary AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.projectDescriptionWelsh AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.caseCreatedDate AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.decision AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.publishStatus AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.sector AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.projectType AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.sourceSystem AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.stage AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.projectLocation AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.projectLocationWelsh AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.projectEmailAddress AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.regions AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.transboundary AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.easting AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.northing AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.welshLanguage AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.mapZoomLevel AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.secretaryOfState AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.anticipatedDateOfSubmission AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.screeningOpinionSought AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.screeningOpinionIssued AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.scopingOpinionSought AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.scopingOpinionIssued AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.section46Notification AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateOfDCOSubmission AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.deadlineForAcceptanceDecision AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateOfDCOAcceptance AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateOfNonAcceptance AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateRRepAppearOnWebsite AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateIAPIDue AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.rule6LetterPublishDate AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.preliminaryMeetingStartDate AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.notificationDateForEventsDeveloper AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateSection58NoticeReceived AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.confirmedStartOfExamination AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.rule8LetterPublishDate AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.deadlineForCloseOfExamination AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateTimeExaminationEnds AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateOfRecommendations AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.deadlineForDecision AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.confirmedDateOfDecision AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.jRPeriodEndDate AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateProjectWithdrawn AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.operationsLeadId AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.operationsManagerId AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.caseManagerId AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.nsipOfficerIds AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.nsipAdministrationOfficerIds AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.leadInspectorId AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.inspectorIds AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.environmentalServicesOfficerId AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.legalOfficerId AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.applicantId AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.migrationStatus AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.migrated AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.ODTSourceSystem AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.SourceSystemID AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.IngestionDate AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.ValidTo AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.IsActive AS String), '.')
                    --Start Horizon only fields
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.examTimetablePublishStatus AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.twitteraccountname AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.exasize AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.tene AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.promotername AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.applicantfirstname AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.applicantlastname AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.addressLine1 AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.addressLine2 AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.addressTown AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.addressCounty AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.Postcode AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.applicantemailaddress AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.applicantwebaddress AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.applicantphonenumber AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.applicantdescriptionofproject AS String), '.')
                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Input.caseNodeId AS String), '.')
            )
        )  AS RowID
    ,Input.IsActive
FROM
    vw_base_Horizon AS Input
    INNER JOIN vw_Horizon_validTo AS Calc
        ON Input.caseId = Calc.caseId
        AND Input.IngestionDate = Calc.IngestionDate
